CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( RecordType_Name__c = "E&D - Projects", RecordType_Name__c = "E&D - Projects - Proposal", RecordType_Name__c = "E&D - Projects - Read Only", RecordType_Name__c = "AV - CC", RecordType_Name__c = "AV - CR", RecordType_Name__c = "AV - CV", RecordType_Name__c = "AV - DB", RecordType_Name__c = "AV - IA", RecordType_Name__c = "AV - LO", RecordType_Name__c = "AV - Master", RecordType_Name__c = "AV - PS", RecordType_Name__c = "AV - TS", RecordType_Name__c = "US - Housing", RecordType_Name__c = "EMEA - Custom Build", RecordType_Name__c = "EMEA - AV", RecordType_Name__c = "EMEA - AV New Business", RecordType_Name__c = "US - Registration"),
TEXT(Show_Occurrence__r.Show_Name__r.Job_Classification__c), TEXT(Show_Name__r.Job_Classification__c))
CustomField.label: Job Class
